citation.article-title: Thermogemmatispora onikobensis gen. nov., sp. nov. and Thermogemmatispora foliorum sp. nov., isolated from fallen leaves on geothermal soils, and description of Thermogemmatisporaceae fam. nov. and Thermogemmatisporales ord. nov. within the class Ktedonobacteria
citation.source: International Journal of Systematic and Evolutionary Microbiology

p.s: Thermogemmatisporaceae (Ther′mo.gem.ma′ti.spo.ra′ce.ae. N.L. fem. n. Thermogemmatispora type genus of the family; -aceae ending to denote a family; N.L. fem. pl. n. Thermogemmatisporaceae the Thermogemmatispora family).
The description is the same as for the genus Thermogemmatispora.
